content: stocking following odd numbered wrong side row in purl stitch ie starting with row 1 as a purl row and working all following odd numbered wrong side row in purl to finish follow the instructions included in any of the dresses patterns for making a button loop seam the back of the camisole from the bottom hem up to the decrease row and weave in all ends before trimming the excess © copyright 2020 all rights reserved j u l i e w i l l i a m s l i t t l e c o t t o n r a b b i t s page 5
